info.name: Dark Bugfu
info.description:
A dark theme for the 2017 forums of wakfu.com

OPTIONS -------------------------

coming soon
info.additionalInfo:
v0.1 - Added a darker color for threads marked as read
v0.1.1 - Added the dark theme to the Create a new thread textarea
v0.1.2 - Fixed a problem with the regex, not it should work in all forums (thanks to Vawokil :3) | Also changed the borders/post separators inside the threads to a darker color | Added a slightly blue tone to pinned posts and made the read ones be darker too
v0.1.3 - Made text have less weight so bold text is more noticeable
v0.1.4 - Added dark tone to the spoiles and fixed a hover button (thanks to Vawokil :3)
v.0.1.5 - Changed the width of the main container to 90% of your screen
v.0.1.6 - updated the url filter since ankama changed the forum word to foro
v.0.1.7 - Added dark color to the report popup | added dark color to dev quotes (thanks Vawokil :3)
v.0.1.8 - Changed the emotes :3
v.0.1.9 - Added sticky sidebar (for browsers that support position:sticky;), changed colors, tweaked the theme overall, added custom icons
v.0.2.0 - Removed sticky, is not a good solution and caused some visual bugs with loooooong text
